dalserver.scs

Class ScsOracle

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.scs.ScsOracle

  • public class ScsOracle
extends java.lang.Object
    ScsOracle provides a simple cone search (SCS) capability for any catalog which can be accessed via JDBC to a MySQL database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScsOracle(java.lang.String jdbcDriver)
      Constructor to generate a new Oracle query object, providing the functionality to query a remote MySQL-hosted catalog.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Disconnect from the remote database.

      Compute the distance in degrees between two points on the sky.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Test the SCS MySQL interface.

      Convert a coordinate value in various formats into a floating point value.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String url,
           java.lang.String database,
           java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
             throws DalServerException
        Connect to the remote database.
        Parameters:
        url - JDBC URL of the remote DBMS.
        database - Database name within remote DBMS.
        username - User name for database login.
        password - User password for database login.
        Throws:
        DalServerException

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect from the remote database.

      • query

        public void query(ScsParamSet params,
         RequestResponse response)
           throws DalServerException,
                  DalOverflowException
        Query the remote catalog, writing results to the output request response object. The response object can later be serialized and returned in various output formats.
        Parameters:
        params - The SCS service input parameters.
        response - The request response object.
        Throws:
        DalServerException
        DalOverflowException

      • parseHMS

        public double parseHMS(java.lang.String hms)
        Convert a coordinate value in various formats into a floating point value. Both sexagesimal and decimal formats are permitted.

      • distance

        public static double distance(double ra1,
              double dec1,
              double ra2,
              double dec2)
        Compute the distance in degrees between two points on the sky. Adapted from some SkyServer code.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test the SCS MySQL interface. 
           ingest [csv-file]    Turn a CSV version of the SCS data model
                                into a ScsData class which contains raw data
                                defining the data model.

   doc [type]           Generate an HTML version of the SCS keyword
                                dictionary.

   table [type]         Generate Java code to create the indicated
                                keywords in a RequestResponse object.
